Uses of Package
ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate

Packages that use ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate
ch.lambdaj   
ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate   
 

Classes in ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate used by ch.lambdaj
Aggregator
          Defines an aggregation operation, i.e. how to aggregate the items of a collection.
 

Classes in ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate used by ch.lambdaj.function.aggregate
Aggregator
          Defines an aggregation operation, i.e. how to aggregate the items of a collection.
Chooser
          An abstract class that define the behaviour af an Aggregator which aggregates two items of a collection just by choosing one of them.
ChooserOnArgument
          An Aggregator that chooses between two item based on the value of an argument operation invoked on them.
InitializedPairAggregator
          A PairAggregator that is initialized to the value of its idempotent item.
PairAggregator
          An aggregator that uses the definition of how to aggregate a pair of items and of the empty (idempotent respect to this aggregation) item.
Sum
          An aggregator that sums numbers
